title: Pirate Hunters - Robert Kurson
description:
Pirate Hunters: Robert Kurson 

Treasure, Obsession, and the Search for a Legendary Pirate Ship.


# ISBN      : 9781400063369 
# Publisher : Random House Publishing Group, 2015
# Pages     : 304

Finding and identifying a pirate ship is the hardest thing to do under the sea. But two menÃ¢â‚¬â€John Chatterton and John MatteraÃ¢â‚¬â€are willing to risk everything to find the Golden Fleece, the ship of the infamous pirate Joseph Bannister.

At large during the Golden Age of Piracy in the seventeenth century, BannisterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s exploits would have been more notorious than BlackbeardÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s, more daring than KiddÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s, but his story, and his ship, have been lost to time. If Chatterton and Mattera succeed, they will make historyÃ¢â‚¬â€it will be just the second time ever that a pirate ship has been discovered and positively identified. Soon, however, they realize that cutting-edge technology and a willingness to lose everything arenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t enough to track down BannisterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s ship. 

They must travel the globe in search of historic documents and accounts of the great pirateÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s exploits, face down dangerous rivals, battle the tides of nations and governments and experts. But itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s only when they learn to think and act like piratesÃ¢â‚¬â€like BannisterÃ¢â‚¬â€that they become able to go where no pirate hunters have gone before.
  
Fast-paced and filled with suspense, fascinating characters, history, and adventure, Pirate Hunters is an unputdownable story that goes deep to discover truths and souls long believed lost
